snippet: Hundreds of construction workers in booming northern British Columbia will take up residence this week in unique digs on board a cruise ferry revamped into a floating luxury hotel....

headline.print_headline: Floating Hotel Draws Workers to NW Canada Boom Town
headline.main: Floating Hotel Draws Workers to NW Canada Boom Town

lead_paragraph: Hundreds of construction workers in booming northern British Columbia will take up residence this week in unique digs on board a cruise ferry revamped into a floating luxury hotel.
